public.defaultNLUConfig:
pipeline:
  - name: rasa_addons.nlu.components.LanguageSetter
  - name: WhitespaceTokenizer
  - name: CountVectorsFeaturizer
  - name: EmbeddingIntentClassifier
  - BILOU_flag: true
    name: CRFEntityExtractor
    features:
      - [low, title, upper]
      - [low, bias, prefix5, prefix2, suffix5, suffix3, suffix2, upper, title, digit, pattern]
      - [low, title, upper]
  - name: rasa_addons.nlu.components.Gazette
  - name: EntitySynonymMapper

private.defaultEndpoints:
nlg:
  url: '{BF_API_HOST}/project/{BF_PROJECT_ID}/nlg'
action_endpoint:
  url: '{ACTIONS_URL}'
tracker_store:
  store_type: rasa_addons.core.tracker_stores.AnalyticsTrackerStore
  url: '{BF_API_HOST}'
  project_id: '{BF_PROJECT_ID}'
private.defaultPolicies:
policies:
  - name: rasa_addons.core.policies.BotfrontMappingPolicy
    triggers:
      - trigger: '^chitchat\..+|^basics\..+'
        action: 'action_botfront_mapping'
  - name: KerasPolicy
    epochs: 200
  - name: FallbackPolicy
  - name: MemoizationPolicy
